ProcessTemplates.Name: Azure Document Intelligence - Extract data and save results to database
ProcessTemplates.Description: This template reads files from a local fileshare, extracts data from them with Azure Document Intelligence, and inserts them into a Microsoft SQL database table.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"InFilePath":{"Value":"\"/\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The path to the local directory containing the files."},"DocumentIntelligenceBaseUrl":{"Value":"\"https://example.com/\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The base URL for accessing the Azure Document Intelligence API endpoints."},"DocumentIntelligenceAPIKey":{"Value":"\"ExampleAPIKey\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"The API key for Azure Document Intelligence requests."},"DocumentIntelligenceModelId":{"Value":"\"prebuilt-read\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The ID of the Document Intelligence model used for analyzing the results. "},"DocumentIntelligenceAPIVersion":{"Value":"\"2023-07-31\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The version number of the Document Intelligence API. "},"TableName":{"Value":"\"extractedData\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The name of the database table, to which the results are inserted."},"ConnectionString":{"Value":"\"Server=myServerAddress;Database=myDataBase;User Id=myUsername;Password=myPassword;\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"Connection string for the database."},"MediaType":{"Value":"\"image/png\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The media type for the Content-Type header sent with Document Intelligence POST request. Change the value depending on which file type is analyzed, e.g. image/png for PNG files."}}

Process.Name: Azure Document Intelligence - Extract data and save results to database
Process.Description: This template reads files from a local fileshare, extracts data from them with Azure Document Intelligence, and inserts them into a Microsoft SQL database table.
